document_data.name: Everard
document_data.mainbody: '''Everard''' was the head [[cleric]] of [[Tempus]] from [[Easthaven]] within the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: Even within his temple, the war priest dressed in heavy armor, such as [[plate mail]]. His body was covered in battle scars from his years of fighting to the righteous cause of Tempus
document_data.Personality: As a member of the [[Order of the Broken Blade]], Everard guarded the secret location of [[Jerrod's stone]], but he felt [[Jerrod]] died in vain because the sign from Tempus meant the barbarian tribes were already defeating the [[archmage]] [[Arakon]] and his [[demon]]s from the [[Lower planes]].
document_data.Possessions: He owned a sling, known as the ''[[sling of Everard]]''. It was a holy weapon created by Tempus and given to Everard to help him defeat the enemies of Icewind Dale. He also fought with a weapon known as ''[[Everard's morning star]]'', an enchanted weapon that could drain the memorized spells of [[mage]]s upon striking them.
document_data.History: In [[Eleint]], [[1281 DR]], a messenger from [[Kuldahar]] was found dying outside the [[Temple of Tempus (Easthaven)|Temple of Tempus]]. After asking for the aid of Easthaven, [[Hrothgar]] decided to put together an expedition to Kuldahar, but Everard refused to travel into the [[Spine of the World]]. He sacrificed his life to close a portal to the Abyss opened by [[Belhifet]].
